general.name: Joul losses
general.description: Heat generated by Joul losses in magnetic field

vector.planar: - gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (source0 * source0+ source1 * source1) * vval
vector.axi: - gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (source0 * source0 + source1 * source1) * r * vval

matrix.planar: gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (uval * uval) * vval
matrix.axi: gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (uval * uval) * r * vval

matrix.planar: gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (udx * udx + udy * udy) * vval
matrix.axi: gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (udr * udr + udz * udz) * r * vval

vector.planar: - gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (upval * upval) * vval
vector.axi: - gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (upval * upval) * r * vval

vector.axi: - gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (upval * upval) * r * vval

vector.axi: - gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (source0 * source0 + source1 * source1) * r * vval

matrix.planar: gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (uval * uval) * vval
matrix.axi: gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (uval * uval) * r * vval

matrix.planar: gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (udx * udx + udy * udy) * vval
matrix.axi: gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (udr * udr + udz * udz) * r * vval

vector.planar: - gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (upval * upval) * vval
vector.axi: - gamma * f*f * (mur * MU0) * (mur * MU0) * (upval * upval) * r * vval
